title: Warlord's Bloodlust Hotfix incoming.
body: Yay no more free lane win Yasuo's!

replies.body:
in your dreams, he is only strong because he gets fed, he only gets fed because you people don't know how to deal with him properly in the first place. Yasuo been nerfed to hell since his release, riot has done enough to him. Not his fault that squishies think that trying to 1v1 him when he is 2 lv ahead and his his tornado up is smart.

I think you just need to learn how to beat him.

well they changed it so you can only proc it if u hit a champion now so no more ez lane sustain, but tryndamere {{champion:23}}  still gets a massive advantage in lane phase dueling he can win a losing duel just cuz of that lucky crit that healed him and gave him 20% atk speed
"that moment your against a garen with 5% crit chance, and every single e spin and q hit crits, but as trynd you dont get 1 single crit on him till the 15 minute mark..."
